name: Code Analysis
desc: Tools for static code analysis, linting, and code quality assessment.

packages.name: ameba
packages.desc: Static code analysis tool for Crystal
packages.info: Ameba is a static code analysis tool for Crystal, helping you write cleaner and more maintainable code by enforcing style guidelines and detecting potential issues.
packages.description: Static code analysis tool for Crystal

packages.name: scc
packages.desc: Fast and accurate code counter with complexity and COCOMO estimates
packages.info: SCC (Sloc, Cloc and Code) is a very fast and accurate code counter with complexity calculations and COCOMO estimates written in Go. It's useful for analyzing codebases and estimating project complexity.
packages.description: Fast and accurate code counter with complexity and COCOMO estimates

packages.name: shellcheck
packages.desc: Static analysis and lint tool, for (ba)sh scripts
packages.info: ShellCheck is a shell script static analysis tool that gives warnings and suggestions for bash/sh shell scripts. It helps identify and fix common shell script issues and follows best practices.
packages.description: Static analysis and lint tool, for (ba)sh scripts

name: Archiving & Compression
desc: Tools for compressing, archiving, and extracting files.

packages.name: p7zip
packages.info: p7zip is a port of 7-Zip for POSIX systems, providing high compression ratio in 7z format and supporting various other archive formats.

packages.name: RAR Archiver
packages.desc: Archive manager for data compression and backups
packages.info: RAR is a proprietary archive file format that supports data compression, error recovery, and file spanning. This package provides tools to create and extract RAR archives.

packages.name: sevenzip
packages.desc: 7-Zip is a file archiver with a high compression ratio
packages.info: 7-Zip is a file archiver with a high compression ratio, supporting multiple archive formats including its own 7z format with LZMA and LZMA2 compression.
packages.description: 7-Zip is a file archiver with a high compression ratio

name: Build Tools & Package Managers
desc: Tools for managing dependencies, building projects, and package management.

packages.name: krew
packages.info: Krew is a plugin manager for kubectl, allowing you to discover and install kubectl plugins with a simple interface. It helps extend kubectl with custom commands for specific Kubernetes tasks.

packages.name: leiningen
packages.info: Leiningen is the easiest way to use Clojure. With a focus on project automation and declarative configuration, it gets out of your way and lets you focus on your code.

packages.name: maven
packages.info: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

name: Virtual Machines
desc: Tools for managing, emulating, and running virtual machines.

packages.name: lima
packages.info: Lima launches Linux virtual machines with automatic file sharing and port forwarding. It's designed to be a lightweight alternative to Docker Desktop for running Linux containers on macOS.

packages.name: Multipass
packages.info: Multipass is a lightweight VM manager for Linux, Windows, and macOS. It lets you quickly spin up Ubuntu VMs with a single command, making it easy to create development environments.

packages.name: qemu
packages.info: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer. It can run operating systems and programs made for one machine on a different machine, and is used by many virtualization tools.

packages.name: UTM
packages.info: UTM is a full-featured virtual machine host for macOS. It's built on QEMU and allows you to run Windows, Linux, and other operating systems on your Mac with a native macOS interface.

name: Browsers & Web Tools
desc: Web browsers and tools for API development and web-related tasks.

packages.name: Hoppscotch
packages.info: Hoppscotch is an open-source API development ecosystem. It provides a lightweight, web-based API client that helps you create and test API requests quickly and efficiently.

packages.name: Orion Browser
packages.info: Orion is a WebKit-based browser designed for macOS. It aims to be a fast, privacy-focused alternative to Safari with support for Chrome and Firefox extensions.
